Generative NFT avatars need:

#1. Personality - Does each generation have a personality?
#2. Diversity - Are the NFTs distinguishable from each other? 
#3. Unique Aesthetic - Is it easily replicable?
#4. Identity - Do the traits stand out?
#5. Authenticity - Does it have a story?

There’s no secret sauce to make a NFT project successful but some required ingredients are diversity and personality.

Those who fail at this generally don’t do well and this is what I look at first when I decide to ape into a project.

Also this is why I hate delayed reveal.
